pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group.

pathParameters.name: name
pathParameters.description: The name of the Redis cache.

pathParameters.name: linkedServerName
pathParameters.description: The name of the linked server that is being added to the Redis cache.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
